subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Ronaldinho, the Brazilian playmaker, was transferred to A.C. Milan late Tuesday. The team said Ronaldinho would arrive in Milan on Wednesday for a medical exam and to sign a contract through June 30, 2011.
snippet: Ronaldinho, the Brazilian playmaker, was transferred to A.C. Milan late Tuesday. The team said Ronaldinho would arrive in Milan on Wednesday for a medical exam and to sign a contract through June 30, 2011.
